summary: The diff demonstrates comprehensive implementation of all requirements addressing the blank draft tab issue. Component exports/imports are verified through App.tsx and LandingPage.tsx changes, Google Fonts and structured data are present in index.html, and extensive styling updates with glassmorphism effects and Tailwind animations are implemented across multiple components. All four requirements appear to be fully addressed.

hallucinated_features.description: Font Awesome icon library migration replacing Lucide icons throughout the application
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focused on fixing the blank tab issue without requesting any icon library changes. The systematic replacement of Lucide icons with Font Awesome (FaMapMarkerAlt, FaTint, FaWrench, FaWind, FaCog, FaCamera, FaStar, FaClock, FaShieldAlt, FaHeart, FaLanguage) was not part of the stated requirements or constraints.

hallucinated_features.description: Extensive animation system with hero drift, shimmer, float, and shine keyframe animations
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraint explicitly stated to 'Preserve all existing functionality including... animations' but did not request new animation features. The addition of drift, shimmer, float-1/2/3 animations in Tailwind config and shine animation in BookingSection button were not requested as part of fixing the blank tab issue.

hallucinated_features.description: Capsule styling design system with rounded-3xl, rounded-2xl, and pill-shaped (rounded-full) components
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraint stated to 'Maintain the current glassmorphism design aesthetic and color scheme' without requesting a new capsule/pill design system. The systematic implementation of glass-card capsule styling, pill-shaped buttons, and rounded aesthetic changes were not part of the fix requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated blue/sky gradient background in LandingPage component
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goal explicitly stated 'Changing the visual design or color scheme' should not be done. The modification of the gradient background in LandingPage.tsx represents a color scheme change not requested in the fix requirements.
